Greetings,

I just came in touch with heritrix and found interest to run it=
.
i'm working on WindowsXP platform. and downloaded heritrix-1.10.1
version=
. istalled java version1.5.0_08 on my system.
i modify the JMXpassword file=
 and gave username and password.
i provide the admin value in property file=
.and extract the profile
folder from Heritrix.jar file and put it in Conf f=
older.

then i got update script from here

http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/gr=
oup/archive-crawler/message/3381
and using that
i install the heritrix and =
set the HERITRIX_HOME in system environment.
give full permission to all fi=
les in heritrix folder.

now when i run i got the following error

<Error>

Fri 10/06/2006 11:17:26.21 Starting heritrix
.

Heritrix failed to start pr=
operly. Possible causes:

- Login and password have not been specified (see=

fault)
  (e.g. another Heritrix instance)
- JMX password file is missing or=
 permissions not set correctly

Do you want to try to fix the permissions (=
Y/N)?y

         on Windows. It was just started minimized =
in a new Window

.

Either fixing the permissions =
failed or there was another problem.

he file
  C:\heritrix-1.10.1\jmxremote.password
manually to yourself .

ror>
